Dark Fog will upgrade by continuously gaining XP in the battle against the player.

This option defines how fast can Dark Fog gain XP in the fight.
strings.生长速度系数描述: This option defines the growth speed of Space Hives and Planetary Bases.
strings.有效难度描述:
The "Valid Difficulty" is determined by the lowest difficulty factor ever reached in the game if the Dark Fog Communicator is used.

This factor will be used to calculate the player's metadata multiplier and achievement unlocks associated with a difficulty factor.
strings.黑雾设置无法更改提示: (All settings above can't be modified in-game)
strings.黑雾设置退出提示:
Settings on this page won't be saved (Unsaved changes will be reverted)

Go Back?
strings.戴森球总发电量: Total Power Generation by Dyson Spheres
strings.银河系COSMO描述: As a member of the COSMO and pioneer of Dyson Sphere Program, the energy you contribute will undoubtedly propel the rapid advancement of Homeland. Your contribution to the upcoming Civilization Type III is forever recorded with the activation of this cluster, as people light up a star in the Milky Way View to honor your achievements!
strings.地中海介绍:
A Mariterra type planet is where the COSMO (Coalition of Stellar Management Organizations) chose Icarus to launch the Dyson Sphere Program.
COSMO's considerations are extensive and thorough; it is a well known fact that these planets are extremely rare within the universe. A glimpse from space reveals that Mariterra planets have a very similar landscape and climate to that of our home planet, which not only relieves Icarus of its homesickness, but also provides a familiar environment for it to get into the swing of its workflow.
The planets’ fragmented continental shelves may lead to more diverse civilizations of local intelligent life. Relatively narrower oceans may facilitate their ability to communicate, while denser seismic zones may make them more inclined to cooperate with each other. Upon the arrival of our mecha, we will probably encounter a class I-II civilization that is already reasonably developed. If we can gain their cooperation, it will save Icarus from many of the most tedious processes involved in the early development of an industrial system, and unify the local stellar system’s resources when progressing the Dyson Sphere program.
Sparing a thought for the borderline unimaginable situation that "there is no indigenous civilization on a Mariterra planet", COSMO is working on it and promises to respond within 15 working days after the plan is finalized.
strings.红石介绍:
The planet is very similar to that of a Mariterra due to a similar nitrogen-oxygen atmosphere and broken continental shelf. The difference between them; however, is the very different ecosystem here, as the sunlight on this Crimsonis planet lies so far left on the red spectrum that the flora here has evolved some kind of red pigment to avoid it from burning through their cells.
Despite being brought under control in time, an observatory has detected stress-secreted alkaloids in a common mushroom on the planet's continent, far from the crisis area. This may indicate that all fungi on this Crimsonis planet are interlinked by mycelium deep underground, or that they are all different strains that have evolved from the same parent.
strings.海洋丛林介绍:
Tropicana planets have 60 to 70 percent of their surface covered by bodies of water, nurturing lush rainforests within the continents.
These biomes see continuous rainfall near the equator, while lower latitudes have distinct wet and dry seasons as the planet rotates.
Tropicanas retain a huge biomass and any local industrial development will shake this large, complex, yet fragile ecosystem to its core, but what’s more important - nature, or progress?
strings.草原介绍:
A characteristic of Prairiea Planets is their dense flora, with up to 95 percent of surface coverage consisting of herbaceous plants, while the remaining area consists of large rivers and lakes of water.
There are many different theories about how Prairiea planets have come to be; the most generally accepted view is that the early formation of the stellar system can be accredited to the overall small number of comets, making the number of comet impacts low. Ice-laden comets are the planets’ main source of water, and so the average precipitation levels recorded on Prairiea planets are insufficient to support complex biospheres.
Other hypotheses such as "solar wind stripping" and "soil formation process obstruction" have also been suggested. However, the end result is the same: these lush planets are suitable for the extensive development of organic industry.
strings.热带草原介绍:
Unlike Prairiea planets, the rocky mountains on Savanna planets prevent water vapor in the form of rain clouds from being effectively transported inland, resulting in a highly uneven distribution of local rainfall.
There are many different theories about how Prairiea planets have come to be. Some scholars believe that due to a scarcity of magnesium and iron in the primordial nebula of the stellar system where these planets were formed, the crust of Prairiea planets once had a high quartz content,therefore creating a slow soil formation process due to its tough exterior. The end result was a thin soil layer, and so herbaceous plants with shallow root systems have become the dominant species on these planets.
Other hypotheses such as "solar wind stripping" and "soil formation process obstruction" have also been suggested. However, the end result is the same: this planet is suitable for the extensive development of organic industry.
strings.樱林海介绍:
Up to 70% of the surface of Sakura Ocean planets are covered by water, nurturing lush rainforests across the continents.
Famous for its endless sea of flowers, distinctive seasons and mild climate, this type of planet became a hotspot for real estate developers, attracting tourists to visit the Cherry Groves and putting the planet on the map.
According to past data, the fertility rate of a population settled on a Sakura Ocean planet tended to be about 3 thousandths higher than other planets, with some studies believing that this may be related to a pheromone secreted by local flora during the blossoming period.
strings.水世界介绍:
True to their name, oceans make up more than 90 percent of the surface of Aquaticas, while any available land consists of small scattered islands.
Regarding the origin of seawater on these planets, it is generally believed that Aquaticas were initially formed within frozen space and thus accumulated a large amount of ice, which later entered the habitable zone under the gravitational perturbation of other celestial bodies; the ice then melted into the vast oceans we now know due to natural sunlight.
Whether it is a hot spring ecosystems created by on chemo-energetic autotrophic bacteria in submarine volcanoes or the cyanobacteria chasing warm ocean currents, the unique ecology of Aquaticas always gives rise to a spectrum of eye-catching organisms. Under the high pressure of constant volcanic movement on the ocean floor, these planets have formed rich veins of Stalagmite Crystal. However, building any kind of factory on a planet scarce in land presents its own challenges.
strings.潘多拉沼泽介绍A:
The surface of a Pandora Swamp planet is almost entirely devoid of water; however, this does not mean that it has an arid climate - on the contrary, it is rather humid.
Almost all of the free-flowing water on Pandora Swamps is stored within local organisms which have evolved around a hollow, tube-like plant with a maximum internal diameter of more than a dozen meters to transfer water across the basin. Academic study states that if the planet's biosphere is considered a civilization, then "their" use of matter has reached a civilization level of 0.79.
strings.潘多拉沼泽介绍B:
The surface of a Pandora Swamp planet is almost entirely covered by a dense carpet of jungle and fungus; these organisms almost "actively" affect the climate of the entire planet, with studies revealing that some forests are able to control the direction of each monsoon by simply adjusting the angle of leaf coverage.
The plants on Pandora Swamp planets have developed ultra-efficient photosynthetic pathways, using 65% of the energy the planet receives from stellar radiation for malic acid synthesis. Academic study states that if the planet's biosphere is considered a civilization, then "their" use of matter has reached a civilization level of 0.79.
strings.熔岩介绍:
A Lava planet’s restless core brings extreme geological activity, with its perennially erupting volcanos bringing incessant lava flow and smog. Its surface is not so much land as it is slag that rises from the molten rock.
All planets go through this process in the early stages of their evolution, and then gradually emerge with a stable crust as the radioactive material inside the planet ends its decay and the mantle cools. If planets come too close to a star; however, they remain molten before being swallowed up by the larger body.
Rushing magma dissolves materials from deep within the mantle forming rich metal and mineral resources, while the stable magma flow offers convenient access to geothermal energy.
strings.火山灰介绍:
The surface of Sulfuria planets has long since cooled, but a restless interior brings active geological movements. The biome’s volcanoes and seismic zones are active year-round, with gases from the magma shaping the planet's atmosphere.
The atmosphere of these planets is filled with acidic gases such as carbon dioxide, nitrogen oxides, and sulfur dioxide, which dissolve in bodies of water to form lakes of sulfuric acid. While this simplifies the extraction of some basic chemical materials, maintenance may bring a new challenge for Icarus.
Active volcanoes may bring mineral resources from deep underground to the surface, but the volcanic ash that fills the area blocks out the sunlight, while the fumes make the climate stifling and an overall unpleasant place to live.
strings.冰原冻土介绍A:
Glacieon planets are composed mainly of ice and rock. Due to tidal action and an uncooled core, many of these icy planets have vast, deep saltwater oceans beneath their thick ice shells, which provide the necessary support for its possible origin of life.
The growth of the ecosystems on these planets is usually stunted due to a lack of stellar irradiation; however, if it satellites a gas giant, a life-bearing Glacieon planet is likely to evolve algae that gain energy by cutting through the magnetic field of the gas giant, thus supporting a flourishing subsurface ecosystem as a first trophic level.
strings.冰原冻土介绍B:
Glacieon planets are composed mainly of ice and rock. Due to tidal action and an uncooled core, many of these icy planets are dotted with active ice volcanoes. When ice volcanoes erupt, large amounts of water, liquid methane or liquid ammonia (depending on the local geology) are ejected out and then quickly re-condensed into solids by the cold climate.
When "ice magma" is hot enough, ice volcanoes may also emit smoke consisting of steam, methane, or ammonia. These plumes form spectacular formations and are photolyzed by stellar irradiation, providing the planet with a thin atmosphere composed of pure oxygen or nitrogen.
strings.冰原冻土介绍C:
Glacieon planets are composed mainly of ice and rock. Although these planets are usually far from stars and do not receive much power from sunlight, some ice sheets are covered by a layer of translucent ice, which causes a greenhouse effect by reflecting sunlight back and forth between the ice layers, melting and cracking it and thus profoundly influencing the planet's topography.
This phenomenon creates a zigzagging equatorial seismic belt between the tropics on some ice sheets, often causing engineering inconvenience in the past.
strings.灰烬冻土介绍:
A cold, rocky planet with an atmosphere consisting mainly of nitrogen, its surface is covered with deserts and snow mounds made of dry ice.
The reason for the dryness of these planets is that they were first formed within the freeze line, and therefore could not be attracted by gravity alone. The water, ammonia and methane that was precipitated from the magma or taken from smaller bodies after the planet took shape escaped from the surface, later reaching higher orbits and becoming disturbed by other celestial bodies where the carbon dioxide in the atmosphere froze into snowflakes at ultra-low temperatures. As a result, nitrogen was left to form cold winds that whip through this empty world.
strings.极寒冻土介绍: An Icefrostia planet is composed mainly of ice and rock; the tundra consists of frozen nitrogen with small amounts of methane and carbon monoxide. The sublimation of the ice crust on the planet's surface offers the planet a thin layer of atmosphere, and because of its extremely low temperatures, we can use machines and carriers made from dry ice and solid methane, where they are as reliable a raw material as metal ceramics.
strings.猩红冰湖介绍:
A Maroonfrost planet is composed mainly of ice and rock. The surface of this type of planet is created by hydrocarbon compounds, and its atmosphere uses nitrogen as its main component.
Through a combination of an ever-changing climate, thunderstorms, and sunlight, the clouds on a Maroonfrost undergo active chemical reactions with certain substances within the lake, thus covering the surface of the planet with an organic reddish-brown soft mud.
There is a high probability of life on this planet; the observatory has discovered single-celled organisms that seem to possess a different form of genetic combination, which may prove very valuable for research.
strings.贫瘠荒漠介绍: A Desolus planet has cooled prematurely because its own mass is too small; devoid of any geological activity, this planet cannot sustain an atmosphere. From space, only a bright highland of ancient crust and a dark sea of basalt condensed by volcanic lava are visible. Because of its thin atmosphere and weak weathering, various small celestial bodies have left craters of various sizes on this Desolus planet.
strings.橙晶荒漠介绍:
There is an old story about a crashed alien ship that was found with a cargo hold full of pyrite, a shiny stone found all over the Onyxtopia planet. The unlucky alien had apparently taken it for the even rarer gold, and as the fable goes, the greedy traveler was dazzled by the riches and ignored the ship's weight capacity, which ultimately led to its demise.
What is more amazing about this planet, however, is its obsidian-like mountains and hills. Researchers believe this was caused during its molten planet phase, when it crashed into an icy planet traveling at about the same speed, causing the planet to cool rapidly. This impact caused material from the core to be thrown onto the surface, which is why it is so iron-rich.
Such a special environment has created a rarity known as a Grating Crystal. Researchers offered to conduct further experiments to test this theory; however, most of the department had left their jobs by this time to indulge in the virtual world, meaning the application for research funding was ultimately abandoned due to extensive processing delays.
strings.戈壁介绍:
Most likely due to its active volcanoes, Gobi planets have an extremely dense carbon dioxide atmosphere. The planet's uncontrolled greenhouse effects cause extremely high surface temperatures, evaporating and photolysing any remaining water and thus completely eliminating any chance of life. 
Protected by this atmosphere, Gobi planets have both a very low temperature disparity between day and night, and a low surface wind speed, allows geological features from ancient times to remain relatively intact.
strings.干旱荒漠介绍A:
The surface of a Scorchedia planet is covered by endless desert, and its carbon dioxide-rich atmosphere carries a large amount of sand. Due to the large temperature disparity between day and night, these planets are often gusty, leaving permanent rings of varying shades on the planet.
There were once mountains on these planets. However, upon the complete formation of the planet these towering peaks were gradually worn away by the wind and the land gradually flattened, eventually leaving only jagged rocks scattered across the desert.
strings.干旱荒漠介绍B:
The surface of a Scorchedia planet is covered by endless desert, and its carbon dioxide-rich atmosphere carries a large amount of sand. Due to the large temperature disparity between day and night, these planets are often gusty, leaving permanent rings of varying shades on the planet.
Ice once existed on this desert planet. However, it sublimated into gas which was gradually photolyzed and escaped into the atmosphere. Rising water vapors during this time caused severe greenhouse effects, leaving distinctive stripes that can still be seen in the desert today.
strings.黑石岩滩介绍:
Halitum planets have an atmosphere dominated by nitrogen and a surface covered by fine sand and salt, indicating that the planet was once dominated by a large ocean.
A civilization may have existed on the planet. However, the development of these space colonies may have failed for various reasons, and it is likely that settlers watched their home planet's ecosystem die out under stellar heating, orbital perturbations, or runaway greenhouse effects.
strings.飓风石林介绍:
The surface of a Cyclonius planet is scattered with the fossils of many ancient trees under a thin atmosphere composed mainly of chlorine gas.
It is widely believed that the planet once possessed a thriving ecosystem until a certain type of algae evolved the ability to metabolize chlorine. The gradually increasing concentration of chlorine gas then poisoned the entire food chain, including the source of the chlorine gas.
strings.气巨星介绍1:
A Gas Giant is a large planet composed mainly of hydrogen and helium, with a core made of ice and rock. Due to the extremely high pressure and temperature of its interior, deep within the atmosphere of the giant is a vast ocean of liquid metallic hydrogen.
These giants are characterized by year-round strong winds, which carry clouds and large amounts of material in a direction parallel to its latitudes, creating ring-like streaks and bright bands. Winds from different directions often collide, producing vortices and thunderbolts.
Because of its fluid environment, winds encounter very little resistance and tend to form semi-permanent storm eyes. For civilizations whose parent star is satellited by a Gas Giant, some storm eyes are often older than the civilization itself, occupying a special place in their culture.
The atmosphere of a Gas Giant is rich in nuclear fuel and other resources, and placing collectors in their orbits provides a steady stream of hydrogen and heavy hydrogen.
strings.气巨星介绍2:
A Gas Giant is a large planet composed mainly of hydrogen and helium, with a core made of ice and rock. Due to the extremely high pressure and temperature of its interior, deep within the atmosphere of the giant is a vast ocean of liquid metallic hydrogen.
These giants are characterized by year-round gales, which carry clouds and large amounts of material in a direction parallel to its latitudes, creating ring-like streaks and bright bands. Winds from different directions often collide, creating vortices and thunderbolts.
The temperature of Gas Giants is relatively low, causing ammonia and ammonium sulfide to condense in the planet's atmosphere to form a light cloud that remains in place throughout the year. Beyond the cloud are pockets of orange and brown, colored by phosphorus and sulfur.
Gas Giants are rich in nuclear fuel and other resources, and placing collectors in their orbits will provide a steady supply of both regular and heavy hydrogen.
strings.气巨星介绍3:
A Gas Giant is a large planet composed mainly of hydrogen and helium, with a core made of ice and rock. Due to the extremely high pressure and temperature of its interior, deep within the atmosphere of the giant is a vast ocean of liquid metallic hydrogen.
These giants are characterized by year-round gales, which carry clouds and large amounts of material in a direction parallel to its latitudes, creating ring-like streaks and bright bands. Winds from different directions often collide, creating vortices and thunderbolts.
Gas Giants are rich in nuclear fuel and other resources, and placing collectors in their orbits will provide a steady supply of both regular and heavy hydrogen.
strings.气巨星介绍4:
A Gas Giant is a large planet composed mainly of hydrogen and helium, with a core made of ice and rock. Due to the extremely high pressure and temperature of its interior, deep within the atmosphere of the giant is a vast ocean of liquid metallic hydrogen.
These giants are characterized by year-round gales, which carry clouds and large amounts of material in a direction parallel to its latitudes, creating ring-like streaks and bright bands. Winds from different directions often collide, creating vortices and thunderbolts.
Because of its proximity to a star, the atmosphere of this gas giant is constantly stripped away by solar winds until only a rocky nucleus remains. Gas Giants are rich in nuclear fuel and other resources, and placing collectors in their orbits will provide a steady supply of both regular and heavy hydrogen.
strings.气巨星介绍5:
A Gas Giant is a large planet composed mainly of hydrogen and helium, with a core made of ice and rock. Due to the extremely high pressure and temperature of its interior, deep within the atmosphere of the giant is a vast ocean of liquid metallic hydrogen.
These giants are characterized by year-round gales, which carry clouds and large amounts of material in a direction parallel to its latitudes, creating ring-like streaks and bright bands. Winds from different directions often collide, creating vortices and thunderbolts.
The planet was once the smaller star in a binary system - its mass was continuously chipped away by another star until it eventually became unable to sustain nuclear fusion, thus becoming a giant planet.
Because of its unusual history, the planet's atmosphere contains a considerable amount of heavy hydrogen.
strings.冰巨星介绍6:
An Ice Giant planet has a rocky core consisting of mainly of water, methane, and ammonia. The giant's sufficiently large self-gravity allows it to possess an extremely dense atmosphere of hydrogen and helium, but fails to evolve further into a Gas Giant because any nebulosity is blown away by solar winds or used by other planets during formation.
The ice content of an Ice Giant's atmosphere increases with decreasing altitude, while its icy mantle is in a state of supercritical fluid at very high atmospheric pressure. The Ice Giant has no solid surface on which to land, with only a faint boundary between its atmosphere and icy mantle.
Seasonal changes and weather activity exist on Ice Giants, however, with few clouds, its colors lack variation and the planet almost seems to appear flat.
strings.冰巨星介绍7:
An Ice Giant planet has a rocky core consisting of mainly of water, methane, and ammonia. The giant's sufficiently large self-gravity allows it to possess an extremely dense atmosphere of hydrogen and helium, but fails to evolve further into a Gas Giant because any nebulosity is blown away by solar winds or used by other planets during formation.
The ice content of an Ice Giant's atmosphere increases with decreasing altitude, while its icy mantle is in a state of supercritical fluid at very high atmospheric pressure. The Ice Giant has no solid surface on which to land, with only a faint boundary between its atmosphere and icy mantle.
The methane in the giant's atmosphere absorbs red and infrared spectra at wavelengths above 600 nm, giving the planet a bluish color. The haze in the atmosphere appears to be more snow condensed from methane due to its lower temperature, with the presence of methane snow making it reflect a clearer pale blue color.
strings.冰巨星介绍8:
An Ice Giant planet has a rocky core composed mainly of water, methane, and ammonia (these three hydrogen compounds are often referred to collectively in astronomy as "ice"). The giant has a large enough self-gravity to have an extremely dense atmosphere composed of hydrogen and helium, but it did not evolve further into a gas giant because the nebulosity was blown away by the solar wind or used by other planets during its formation.
The ice content of an Ice Giant's atmosphere increases with decreasing altitude, while its icy mantle is in a state of supercritical fluid at very high atmospheric pressure. The Ice Giant has no solid surface on which to land, with only a faint boundary between its atmosphere and icy mantle.
Being too close to a star and subject to strong tidal action means that the giant maintains an extremely hot surface temperature. With temperatures exceeding 1000°C, clouds of silicates and iron vapor render the whole planet a vibrant emerald green.
strings.冰巨星介绍9:
An Ice Giant planet has a rocky core consisting of mainly of water, methane, and ammonia (these three hydrides are often referred to collectively as "ice" in astronomy). The giant's sufficiently large self-gravity allows it to possess an extremely dense atmosphere of hydrogen and helium, but fails to evolve further into a Gas Giant because any nebulosity is blown away by solar winds or used by other planets during formation.
The ice content of an Ice Giant's atmosphere increases with decreasing altitude, while its icy mantle is in a state of supercritical fluid at very high atmospheric pressure. The Ice Giant has no solid surface on which to land, with only a faint boundary between its atmosphere and icy mantle.
Because of its relatively young age, this Ice Giant is still relatively hot, causing the ice in its atmosphere to undergo chemical reactions in the presence of ultraviolet light. These reactions result in spectacular colors and patterns that can be observed from space.
strings.最大回复速度描述:
This displays the maximum recovery rate at which the planetary shield can block damage.

The maximum growth rate is directly proportional to the <color=#ff9060b0>surplus power</color> in the power grid. 

This is crucial to resist intense attack from enemy, <color=#ff9060b0>build more power facilities</color> if you want to increase this recovery rate.

strings.行星护盾破碎标识描述: The current planet does not have a Planetary Shield deployed.

strings.物流运输站建造提示:
Tips: Planetary Logistics Station allows efficient long-distance transportation on the planet, but can't transfer cargo to other planets.
At least two Logistics Stations and several Logistics Drones are required to create transport routes.

strings.驱动引擎等级不足: Drive Engine level too low. Can't warp.
strings.曲速能量不足: Mecha energy too low. Can't warp.
strings.距离宇宙讯息太近: Too close to the cosmic message
strings.当前回复速率描述:
The small number on the left shows the real-time recovery rate at which the planetary shield can block damage.

Current recovery rate mainly depends on the <color=#ff9060b0>surplus power</color>. Planetary Shield cannot resist damage constantly if the recovery rate is too low, <color=#ff9060b0>please build more power facilities</color>.

Moreover, if energy ratio of Planetary Shield is over 2/3, the recovery rate will decrease.
strings.物品简报按键提示2:
[<color=#61D8FFFF>SHIFT</color> + <color=#61D8FFFF>L MOUSE</color>] Copy and build
[<color=#61D8FFFF>/ ?</color>] Hide/show tips for keys
strings.无法交换燃料: Too many items in hand. Can’t exchange fuel!
strings.不能手动放入物品: Can’t manually place items in this slot
strings.标记提示描述: Click to set a memo tag icon on this section of the Conveyor Belt. Once set, it will be displayed in the world.
strings.线路容量提示描述: The exact points of the total capacity of the Conveyor Belt is shown here. Each item on the Conveyor Belt occupies 10 points.
strings.节点区间提示描述:
Based on the exact points shown in the total capacity of the route, here shows the precise interval of the selected section of the Conveyor Belt on the transport route:
[Start, End] @ center
strings.戴森云描述: A dense belt consisting of many <color="#FD965ECC">Solar Sails</color> is the Dyson Sphere in its early form. Use the <color="#FD965ECC">Ray Receiver</color> to receive power collected by the Dyson Sphere.
strings.点击打开科技树: Click here to open technology tree.
strings.自动研究当前科技: In Research Mode, the Lab will automatically research ongoing technologies in the Technology Tree.
strings.选择模式提示:
Tips:
[ <color=#fffa>Matrix Mode</color> ] 		-	Produces matrices.
[ <color=#fffa>Research Mode</color> ] 	-	Researches technologies that
											require matrices.
strings.无研究的科技提示:
Tips:
Labs will work only after <color="#ff9060d0">research requiring matrices</color> is initiated in the <color="#ff9060d0">Technology Tree</color>.
All Labs share the same research progress.
strings.研究院返回按钮提示: Stop research of the Lab and return to idle mode.
strings.大型采矿机速率设置提示: Slide bar to set mining speed of the Mining Machine
strings.框架描述: Nodes maintain Dyson Sphere Frames. To construct the corresponding Frames, continue launching <color="#FD965ECC">Small Carrier Rockets</color> to each Node.
strings.提升黑雾攻击性描述: Improve Dark Fog aggressiveness with Metadata
strings.降低黑雾攻击性描述: Weaken Dark Fog aggressiveness with Metadata
strings.撕毁协议描述: Tear up the truce agreement with Dark Fog.
strings.推迟进攻描述: Transmit Metadata to Dark Fog in exchange for a temporary truce (Dark Fog will enter Passive Attack Mode)
strings.使用通讯器后果: Using the the Dark Fog Communicator to lower the difficulty will change the "Valid Difficulty".
strings.运输塔功率设置提示:
Slide to adjust max charge power of the Station/Distributor.
Real-time charge power = Max charge power × Percentage of real-time electricity deficiency
strings.包括轨道采集器提示: Send Vessels to the Orbital Collector to pick up cargo.
strings.曲速启用路程提示:
If the distance exceeds the warp distance, Vessels can carry and automatically utilize the <color="#FD965EC0">Space Warpers</color>.
<color="#FD965EC0">Note:</color> Activating warp will consume a significant amount of power!
strings.翘曲器必要性提示: If the distance exceeds the warp distance, Vessels <color="#FD965EC0">must/may not</color> carry Space Warpers prior to departure.
strings.拆分提示文字:
[ <size=13><color=#FD965EFF>0</color></size> ] ~ [ <size=13><color=#FD965EFF>9</color></size> ] [ <size=13><color=#FD965EFF>←</color></size> ] Enter number
[ <size=13><color=#FD965EFF>SHIFT</color></size> ]  Split by the item’s <color=#FD965EFF>stack count</color>
[ <size=13><color=#FD965EFF>+</color></size> ] / [ <size=13><color=#FD965EFF>-</color></size> ] Increase/decrease by one group
<color=#FFFFFF30>The farther the cursor is vertically away from the slider, the finer the split</color>
[ <size=13><color=#FD965EFF>/ ?</color></size> ] Hide / show this tip
strings.向玩家配送模式3: Provide to and collect from Icarus
strings.不限回收类型提示描述: Once checked, the Logistics Distributor will collect all types of items from Icarus and stop distributing items to other distributors.
strings.滞留物品提示描述: When items returned by the Logistics Bot can't be stored in the Depot, they will be placed in the Logistics Distributor. Click to take out excess items.
strings.锁定数量提示文字: Click the icon to lock the cargo quantity. Once locked, the cargo quantity will not change, regardless of any changes in cargo supply or demand.
strings.配送器设置提示2: Operation failed: No item filter specified
strings.配送器设置提示3: Active distribution failed: No Logistics Bot
strings.配送器设置提示4: Active distribution failed: Power Grid disconnected
strings.配送线路数量提示1: {0} available route(s) / {1} route(s) out of range
strings.自动补充提示文字:
Enable/disable auto-placement of this type of item.
When auto-placement is enabled, the item in the Inventory will be automatically placed in the slot, when you <color="#FD965EBB">open the panel</color> / <color="#FD965EBB">paste settings</color> / <color="#FD965EBB">paste buildings after creating a Blueprint</color>.
When auto-deployment is enabled in Sandbox Mode, the quantity of transport devices will always be the max value.
strings.采集减半: Output drops by half after {0:0.00} hours straight
strings.分馏塔无配方:
This Fractionator is not working
Input raw materials to fractionate
strings.监测周期提示描述:
Aligning the cycle with the production time of the corresponding product can stabilize the readings.
Press the [←] and [→] keys to assign the cycle.
strings.目标流量提示描述:
Set the target flow of cargo passing through within the monitoring cycle.
E.g.: If three Labs are producing Structure Matrices, the target flow and cycle can be set as 3pcs/8s.
strings.音高提示描述: Press the [←] and [→] keys to assign pitch
strings.长度提示描述:
Set playback length, i.e., duration of one time of playback.
If the length set is longer than the audio length, you will wait for the remaining duration after the audio ends.
If the length set is shorter than the audio length, the audio will either stop or start a loop playback.
strings.衰减半径提示描述: Set volume roll-off range of the speaker
strings.货物过滤提示: Click to select target cargo for the Monitor.
strings.流速器沙盒模式提示描述: Check to enable "Generate/Consume cargo" feature. Select which cargo to generate or consume using the "Cargo Filter", and adjust the speed of cargo generation or consumption by setting the monitoring cycle and target flow.
strings.直接发电提示: In Power Generation mode, the energy received by the Ray Receiver is directly transmitted to the Power Grid.
strings.光子生成描述: In Photon Generation mode, the Ray Receiver acquires energy at a very high power level and stores it directly as Critical Photons.
strings.光子生成提示: In Photon Generation mode, the Ray Receiver acquires energy at a very high power level and stores it directly as Critical Photons.
strings.持续工作提示: Continuously receiving rays will slowly increase the <color="#FD965ECC">max output</color> and <color="#FD965ECC">ray receiving efficiency</color>. If no rays are received, progress will decline rapidly.
strings.最大输出提示: Display the current theoretical max output power of the Ray Receiver. It can be increased via <color="#FD965ECC">Graviton Lens</color> and <color="#FD965ECC">continuous work</color>.
strings.射线接收效率提示: Indicates the efficiency of energy transmission from the Dyson Sphere to the Ray Receiver. It can be increased by upgrading technologies or continuous work.
strings.请求功率提示: Indicates the current power demand of the Ray Receiver from the Dyson Sphere. If the Dyson Sphere's power is insufficient, the distributed power will be lower than the requested power. The requested power from the Dyson Sphere will be higher than the rated output power of the Receiver due to ray receiving efficiency. Continuous work can help to reduce power loss.
strings.戴森球状态提示: Indicates the total power requested and total power generation of Dyson Sphere.
strings.能量枢纽放电提示: In Discharge mode, the Energy Exchanger consumes fully charged Accumulator to release energy and supply power to the Power Grid.
strings.能量枢纽待机提示: Energy Exchanger is idle in this mode.
strings.能量枢纽充电提示: In Charge Mode, the Energy Exchanger uses surplus electricity in the Power Grid to fully charge an empty Accumulator.
strings.复制按钮提示: Copy building settings (recipe, filter, mode, etc..)  shortcut [<color="#FD966E"><</color>]
strings.粘贴按钮提示: Paste building settings (recipe, filter, mode, etc..)  shortcut [<color="#FD966E">></color>]
strings.设置过滤器文字:
Set item filters in Depot.

You can also use <color=#FD966EB0>[M Mouse]</color> to click the corresponding slot <color=#FD966EB0>to set individual</color> filters.
strings.设置统一过滤器文字: Set a uniform item filter for all slots in Depot
strings.设置现有过滤器文字: Set a filter for each slot by the current item placement of Depot
strings.删除过滤器文字: Clear all set item filters of all slots of Depot
strings.自动化容量限制提示: Adjust the number of slots designated for automatic item placement. The remaining slots can only be filled manually. Automatic removal will not be affected.
strings.自动化容量限制提示1: Adjust the number of slots designated for automatic item placement. The remaining slots can only be filled manually. Automatic removal will not be affected. Items collected from Icarus are not affected either.
strings.自动化容量分隔提示: Auto-picked items cannot be placed in the blue slots, and the items cannot be retrieved by the automated facilities. They can feed in items in the blue slots.
strings.自动化容量分隔提示1: Auto-picked items cannot be placed in the blue slots, and the items cannot be retrieved by the automated facilities. They can feed in items in the blue slots.
strings.开关警报提示描述: Enable facility monitoring to display system alarms if there is a malfunction. Each facility needs to be configured separately.
strings.超新星按钮描述:
Turrets will accumulate energy for a while when Supernova is enabled. After accumulating, Turrets will enter 5-second Burst Mode. When grid power supply is lower than 30%, Supernova will switch off automatically.
Once Supernova is enabled, click this button again to turn it off.
strings.超新星数量描述: This indicates the number of Turrets that can enable a supernova simultaneously.
strings.攻击中继站提示: Turret, upon activation, will attack Relay Stations in range. Yet, the attack against Relay Stations will <color="#FD965ECC">greatly pose Threat</color> to the corresponding Hive. Activation is not recommended at the beginning of the game!
strings.相位偏移描述: Slide bar to set the phase of this Jammer Tower, allowing a maximum delay of 5 seconds. A Jammer Tower with a phase shift of one second will operate one second after a Tower with zero second phase shift. Change the phase shift of a Jammer Tower will not change its firing rate.
strings.中继站登陆描述:
A Relay Station is landing on {0}.
Caution: Attacking Relay Stations will <color="#FD965ECC">greatly pose Threat</color> to the corresponding Hive. A Relay Station cannot land on surface covered by Planetary Shield.
strings.行星护盾破损描述:
Planetary Shield on {0} is collapsing.
The recovery rate of Planetary Shield is related to surplus power, please build more power facilities. Upgrade [Planetary Shield] to improve its energy efficiency.
strings.火种登陆描述:
A seed is approaching {0}.
A product of Hive expansion. Once the Seed has been created, it will go to a new planetary system to form its own Hive.
strings.建筑摧毁描述:
Building on {0} is destroyed!
Upgrade [Auto Reconstruction Marking] to better rebuild those ruins.
strings.资源耗尽描述:
{1} on {0} is depleted.
[Vein Utilization] can increase mining speed and reduce ore loss per mining, which extends the life of resources.
strings.点击科技树提示:
Scientific technology gives the most productivity!
Open <color="#FD965ECC">Technology tree (T)</color> to activate a research.
strings.查看矿物分布提示:
Now you can view this <color="#FD965ECC">planet's 
vein distribution</color> from here.
strings.机体放置燃料提示: You can open <color="#FD965ECC">Mecha Panel (C)</color> to replenish some fuel.
strings.电设覆盖提示: Power transmission facility. Its sensing range can cover facilities that need power.
strings.风电描述: Wind turbine is a small power generation facility which can work without fuel.
strings.矿机描述: Mining Machine automatically collects ores and exports them via Conveyor Belt.
strings.带臂建造提示: You can now build <color="#FD965ECC">Conveyor belt</color> and <color="#FD965ECC">sorter</color>.
strings.带臂描述:
Conveyor Belts can automatically transport cargo.
Sorters can deliver cargo from Conveyor Belts to Facilities.
strings.熔炉描述: Smelters can convert ores into more advanced materials.
strings.研究站描述:
Matrix Lab can produce matrices.
Multiple Matrix Labs can be used to research one single technology at the same time.
strings.矿脉提示: Click to turn ON / OFF real-time veins distribution details
strings.拿起多格同类物品: Pick up multiple same type of items
strings.拿起全部同类物品: Pick up all same type of items
strings.拖动批量建造: Press and drag for batch building
strings.点击确定起始点: Click a building to confirm starting point
strings.点击建筑确认升级: Click a building to confirm upgrade
strings.核心能量描述: Here shows the mecha's core energy and the energy needed for moving, collection, building, etc. The mecha burns <color="#FD965EC0">fuel</color> to replenish energy. When energy is exhausted, all mecha activities will be restricted.
strings.黑雾发动攻击警告: Dark Fog Swarm is launching an assault
strings.威胁度解释: The swarm will launch an assault when threat is full.
strings.存档备份提示: (<color="#FD965ECC">Cloud save is not available</color>. Back up your saved games and view them on the right.)
strings.加载存档失败: Failed to load saved game. This may be due to an incompatible version or a corrupted file.
strings.删除存档文字: Delete saved game file [{0}]? The file can’t be recovered !
strings.加载新存档: Quit the game and load a new saved game file?
strings.路径和权限: Save failed. Please check the path and file write permissions!
strings.游戏预览提示描述:
- The game is a beta/pre-release version.
  - Some platform functions may not work properly on this version.
  - Some game features may not work properly and may cause crashes.
strings.矿脉分布提示: Click to enable / disable real-time vein distribution.  This requires [Universe Exploration 1]
strings.电力网络提示: Click to enable / disable real-time Power Grid status
strings.防御范围提示: Click to open/close real-time defense coverage details
strings.详情显示提示: Open and close Detail Display menu.
strings.机体面板提示: Click to check mecha's current status and replenish fuel.
strings.更换燃料提示描述: Immediately clear the current residual combustion progress.
strings.无法取出正在出击的战斗机: Unable to retrieve Fighters in action
strings.能量盾充能速度1描述:
Priority will be given to <color=#FD965EC0>Core Energy</color>

Energy Shield charge power under this condition:
1.0 x current fuel power x current Core Energy %
strings.能量盾充能速度2描述:
Core Energy is <color=#7DFF6FB8>given equally</color> to Energy Shield Charge

Energy Shield charge power under this condition:
2.0 x current fuel power x current Core Energy %
strings.能量盾充能速度3描述:
Priority will be given to <color=#92E4FFC0>Energy Shield Charge</color>

Energy Shield charge power under this condition:
3.0 x current fuel power x current Core Energy %
strings.自动重建按钮描述: When enabled, a destroyed building will be automatically marked with a hologram.
strings.自动补充燃料提示描述:
When enabled, when the current fuels depleted, a group of fuels of <color=#FD965EC0>the same type</color> will be automatically obtained from the <color=#FD965EC0>Mecha Inventory</color> for replenishment.
If all fuels are depleted and there are no fuels of the same type, the fuel chamber will be refilled from the Mecha Inventory by <color=#FD965EC0>energy from low to high</color>.
strings.自动补充弹药提示描述:
When enabled after the current ammos are depleted, a group of ammos of 
<color=#FD965EC0>the same type</color> will be automatically obtained from the <color=#FD965EC0>Mecha Inventory</color> for replenishment.
If there is no current type of ammo, ammos of <color=#FD965EC0>other levels</color> will be replenished.
strings.自动补充战斗机提示描述:
When enabled, once a certain type of drones deplete,
a group of drones of the <color=#FD965EC0>same type</color> will be automatically obtained from the <color=#FD965EC0>Mecha Inventory</color> for replenishment.
strings.自动补充编队提示描述:
When enabled, <color=#FD965EC0>a Fleet in action</color>
will automatically replenish vacant slots from the <color=#FD965EC0>Hangar</color>.
strings.机甲面板提示一内容:
Here displays Icarus' durability. Icarus' durability will deplete when it's attacked or in an extreme environment.

Notes:
When durability falls to 0, Icarus will be <color=#FF5D4CD0>destroyed</color> and disconnected from CentreBrain.
Redeployment requires <color=#FD965EC0>Metadata</color>. Available Metadata is shown in <color=#FD965EC0>[Stats Panel (P)] </color>.

<color=#7DFF6FB8>Green</color> number shows mecha <color=#7DFF6FB8>body</color> durability;
<color=#92E4FFC0>Blue</color> number shows damage resistance of <color=#92E4FFC0>Energy Shield</color>.

Use [Armor Customize] to customize mecha. Change Icarus' armor to what you desire (by consuming materials) and improve some stats.
strings.机甲面板提示二内容:
Mecha's Energy Shield can <color=#92E4FFC0>resist</color> <color=#92E4FFC0>any damage</color> from enemies and protect all facilities within its radius.

Energy Shield's radius will increase as mecha flies from ground to space.

Big number indicates Energy Shield's power. Each <color=#92E4FFC0>50kJ</color> power can resist 1 damage. Once its power is exhausted, the shield takes some time to reactivate.

Small number indicates the shield's <color=#61D8FFc0>charging</color> speed and <color=#FD965EC0>consuming</color> speed. Energy Shield charge costs mecha's Core Energy. Charge speed depends on
[power generation output of current fuels] and [current Core Energy %]
strings.机甲面板提示三内容:
Mecha's Core Energy guarantees all activities of mecha. Mecha will consume Core Energy when they move, collect, build, replicate items and manually research teachnology. The Core Energy bar and stats are displayed at the bottom right of the screen.

Insufficient Core Energy will limit the activities of the mecha, causing slower movement or hampering research. So, it is important to monitor and manage mecha's Core Energy usage. Once Core Energy is insufficient, fuels need to be <color=#FD965EC0>replenished to the fuel chamber on the upper left corner</color> of this screen.

Different fuels raise (or decrease) fuel chamber power to different degrees
If [Armor Customize] is used, mecha's energy consumption coefficient will be affected according to mecha stats.
strings.机甲面板提示四内容:
Mecha is on the planet now. Use [Direction Keys] or [R Mouse] to move it.
<color=#FD965EC0>Upgrade mecha</color> to obtain <color=#FD965EC0>more advanced</color> mobility.
strings.机甲面板提示四内容一:
Mecha is on the planet now. Use [Direction Keys] or [R Mouse] to move it.
<color=#FD965EC0>Double click [Space]</color> to lift off, and enter <color=#FD965EC0>Flight Mode</color>
strings.机甲面板提示四内容二:
Mecha is in low air. Use [Direction Keys] or [R Mouse] to move it.
Press <color=#FD965EC0>[Alt]</color> to return to the ground.
<color=#FD965EC0>Upgrade mecha</color> to obtain ability to <color=#FD965EC0>enter space</color>.
strings.机甲面板提示四内容三:
Mecha is in low air. Use [Direction Keys] or [R Mouse] to move it.
Press <color=#FD965EC0>[Alt]</color> to return to the ground.
Hold <color=#FD965EC0>[Space]</color> and <color=#FD965EC0>[Direction Keys]</color>. When reaching a certain altitude, the mecha can enter space <color=#FD965EC0>Cruise Mode</color>.
strings.机甲面板提示四内容四:
Mecha is in Cruise Mode. Press [↑] to rotate the mecha to the forward direction of the camera.
Actionss like accelerating, decelerating, and turning, change mecha's speed and consume power.

Press <color=#FD965EC0>[G]</color> to view detailed action guide.

Target a planet to land on it. To reach a distant target in a short time, you need to <color=#FD965EC0>upgrade mecha</color> to enable <color=#FD965EC0>Warp Flight</color>.
strings.机甲面板提示四内容五:
Mecha is in Cruise Mode. Press [↑] to switch mecha to the front of the camera.
Operations changing mecha's speed, like accelerating, decelerating, and turning, consume power.

Press <color=#FD965EC0>[G]</color> to view detailed operation guide.

Target a planet to land on it. To reach a distant target in a short time, you can use <color=#FD965EC0>Space Warper</color>. Press <color=#FD965EC0>[CapsLock]</color> to enable <color=#FD965EC0>Warp Flight</color>.
strings.机甲面板提示五内容:
When the <color=#7DFF6FB8>(green hologram)</color> for construction is planned, Construction Drone will automatically head to construct.
"Task Points" indicate the total number of buildings each drone can build before it returns.

Drones' dispatching and flying consumes mecha's Core Energy.

<color=#FD965EC0>Hold</color> <color=#FD965EC0>[L Mouse] </color>on the hologram to <color=#FD965EC0>intantly</color> construct the building.

If a building near mecha is <color=#FD965EC0>destroyed</color>, mecha or Battlefield Analysis Base will <color=#FD965EC0>automatically</color> analyze debris and <color=#FD965EC0>mark it with a hologram</color>. Then, drone will fly there to reconstruct.
Auto reconstruction marking speed is shown on the right.
strings.基站自动重建提示描述: When enabled, building debris near the base will be automatically marked with a hologram.
strings.基站自动拾取提示描述: When enabled, base will automatically pick up nearby trash
strings.基站建设无人机提示描述: When enabled, base will dispatch Construction Drone for construction and repair
strings.基站自动补充编队提示描述:
When enabled, <color=#FD965EC0>a Fleet in action</color>
will automatically replenish vacant slots from the base's <color=#FD965EC0>Depot</color>.
strings.基站战斗机提示描述:
When enabled, available Combat Drones will <color=#FD965EC0>be automatically dispatched</color> to strike nearby enemies.
When disabled, Combat Drones will be <color=#FD965EC0>recalled immediately</color> and won't be dispatched again.
strings.建设机优先建造描述: Construction Drone will give priority to <color=#FD965EC0>construction</color> tasks.
strings.建设机优先修理描述: Construction Drone will give priority to <color=#FD965EC0>repair</color> tasks.
strings.建设机均衡模式描述: Construction Drone will be <color=#7DFF6FB8>evenly assigned</color> to construction and repair tasks.
strings.Z编队操控提示描述:
Left click to <color=#FD965EC0>launch</color> the fleet.
When launched, click to set Command Mode/Auto Mode.
Right click to <color=#FD965EC0>recall</color> the fleet.
(Auto-launch/recall will be disabled in Command Mode)
strings.Z编队全部操控提示描述:
Left click to <color=#FD965EC0>launch</color> all fleets.
When launched, click to set Command Mode/Auto Mode.
Right click to <color=#FD965EC0>recall</color> all fleets.
(Auto-launch/recall will be disabled in Command Mode)
strings.Z调遣编队描述: Dispatch fleets in command to certain position.
strings.航行模式无法召出: Unable to dispatch Ground Squadrons in Cruise Mode
strings.机体能量过低: The mecha's core energy is insufficient
strings.拾取掉落筛选提示描述:
Set <color=#FD965EC0>to automatically pick up or ignore</color> specific items, or set <color=#FD965EC0>not to drop</color> specific items when Dark Fog is defeated.
<color=#FD965EC0>Press and hold [Shift]</color> to ignore filter settings and manually pick up all items.
Right click to enable / disable "Pickup".
strings.掉落筛选提示描述: Set <color=#FD965EC0>not to drop</color> specific items when Dark Fog is defeated.
strings.拾取筛选提示: Left click on the Item icon to switch between "Manual Pickup", "Auto Pickup" and "Ignore".
strings.掉落筛选提示: Click on the Item icon to set if that item will drop after Dark Fog has been defeated.
strings.单基地产出提示:
[ Output per Base ] the theoretical maximum output of a single Dark Fog Base.
Kill rate requirement on current difficulty: {0} kills/min = Output per Base
strings.机甲爆盾技能提示描述:
Press and hold [B] to charge. When the accumulated power is over 20% of Energy Shield's capacity, Energy Shield Burst can be released.
Every <color='#92E4FFAB'>1 MJ</color> accumulated power can deal <color="#FD965ECC">{0} hp</color> damage (maximum <color="#FD965ECC">{1} hp</color> damage per enemy). The maximum burst radius of Burst increases along with the radius of Energy Shield.
strings.重新部署描述: Redeploy Icarus to the landing point on the initial planet. All items in the inventory will be lost.
strings.立刻复活描述: Reassemble Icarus immediately, and all items in the inventory can be retained.

strings.成就开启新存档提示: Click this button to enable achievement detection.
strings.元数据系统用户不一致提示:
The current player is not the same as the one who created the saved game.

strings.元数据系统作弊提示:
The current game stats are abnormal.

strings.元数据提取提示描述: Instantiate Metadata as matrices at <color="#FD965ECC">1:1</color> and add them to Inventory.
strings.初次使用元数据描述:
Some achievements can't be unlocked if Metadata is used. Continue?
(Can be viewed in Achievements tab)
strings.元数据详情描述:
Metadata are obtained by producing matrices at the yield of matrices per minute.
Metadata can be used in the next game (at a different cluster address) to buy out technologies or instantiated as matrices.
strings.元数据计算规则描述:
-  Metadata output calculation: Matrices <color="#FD965EBB">production per minute</color> over the past hour x <color="#FD965EBB">cluster multiplier %</color>.
-  Metadata can be used to <color="#FD965EBB">buy out technologies</color> in the Technology Tree, or instantiated as matrices and sent to the Inventory.
-  Metadata produced at current cluster address can only be consumed in saved games created at other cluster addresses. However, they can be used for rebuilding Icarus in this game.
-  Some achievements of the current game can't be unlocked if Metadata is instantiated.

-  <color="#FD965EBB">Cloud game save is not supported yet</color> for Metadata.

Example: If the Structure Matrix output in the One-hour Production Graph is 1,800 per minute, 1,800 Meta-Structures will be produced (assuming that the cluster multiplier is 100%). If the output then climbs to 2,000 per minute, another 200 Meta-Structures will be produced. Then, if 500 Meta-Structures are used in the next saved game, there will be 1,500 available Meta-Structures remaining.

Example: If two saved games share the same Cluster address and the Structure Matrix production of each is 900 per minute and 1,800 per minute, 1,800 Meta-Structures will be produced but can be instantiated in neither saved games.
strings.总数据描述:
Current amount of Metadata.
It equals the total amount of Metadata obtained from every cluster minus the total amount of used Metadata in every cluster. All Metadata can be used for rebuilding Icarus.

Note: <color="#FD965EBB">Cloud game save is not supported yet</color> for Metadata.
strings.该星团可使用描述:
Current immediately instantiable Metadata.
You can't instantiate the Metadata contributed by current cluster address, so it equals to the <color="#FD965EBB">remaining amount</color> minus <color="#FD965EBB">contribution from current cluster address</color>.

Metadata can't be used if <color="#FD965EBB">Sandbox Tools</color> have been used.
strings.该存档贡献描述:
In current saved game, the Metadata output is calculated by the <color="#FD965EBB">production per minute</color> over the past hour x <color="#FD965EBB">cluster multiplier %</color>.

If a new cluster address is used in the current saved game, all Metadata can be immediately obtained;
otherwise, only when the contribution is larger than every saved game with the same cluster address can you continue to obtain Metadata.

Example:  If there are 2 saved games sharing the same cluster address, the production of gamesave 1 is 1200 per minute and the production in gamesave 2 is 1,800 per minute. Then the current cluster contribution is 1800 Metadata. If you continue to play gamesave 1, only when the matrix production exceeds 1,801 per minute can you continue to obtain Metadata.
strings.该星团贡献描述:
At <color="#FD965EBB">current cluster address</color>, you obtain Metadata at the highest matrix production per minute across all saved games.

Example: If there are 2 saved games at the cluster address, the production of each is 900 per minute and 1,800 per minute, the current cluster contribution is 1,800 Metadata.
strings.该存档已使用描述: The amount of Metadata which have been used to <color="#FD965EBB">rebuild Icarus</color> or <color="#FD965EBB">instantiated</color> in current saved game.
strings.该星团已使用描述: The amount of Metadata which have been used to <color="#FD965EBB">rebuild Icarus</color> or <color="#FD965EBB">instantiated</color> in all saved games.

strings.存档测试提示描述: Save the game now to analyze the saved game structure and performance.

strings.科技树启动提示: Click to resume the research queue.
strings.右键点击取消研究: Right click to cancel this research.
strings.买断科技描述:
Instantiate and use Metadata to directly unlock technologies.
To use part of the Metadata, you can instantiate Metadata as a separate matrix from the Metadata tab in Statistics Panel and use the Matrix Lab for research.
strings.直接解锁科技描述: Click to directly unlock the technology.
strings.是否更换研究项目:
Researching [<color="#FD965EC0">{0}</color>]
Change research project? (Progress from the previous research will be saved)
strings.一键解锁科技提示文字: Will unlock most of the technologies. Continue?
strings.沙土面板描述: Displays total soil pile volume owned. When laying a Foundation or constructing a building, if the terrain is leveled to zero altitude, you will <color="#61D8FFC0">obtain</color> or <color="#FD965EC0">consume</color> soil piles.
strings.移除地基: You can lay Foundation/without decoration, and level terrains to zero altitude.
strings.铺设地基: You can lay Foundation/with decoration, and level terrains to zero altitude.
strings.地基涂色描述: Paint the Foundation with default/custom colors.
strings.默认颜色描述: Left click to select a color. Default colors can't be changed.
strings.自定义颜色描述: Left click to select a color. Right click to open the palette to customize colors. If you change a custom color, all the Foundations painted with that color previously will be automatically replaced with the new color.
strings.确认移除深洞提示: Consume Foundations and Soil piles to refill Core Driller?
strings.矿物掩埋: In this mode, laying Foundation can <color="#FD965EC0">bury</color> veins underground. Click to switch to the "Restore Veins" mode.
strings.矿物还原: In this mode, laying Foundation can <color="#61D8FFC0">restore</color> the buried veins. There can be no buildings in the restoration point, or the feature won't take effect. Click to switch to the "Bury Veins" mode.
strings.将另存为新文件: Will save as a new file
strings.将另存为新蓝图集: Will save as a new portfolio
strings.创建蓝图描述: Copy existing planning and save as a Blueprint. Click to open the Create Blueprint mode.
strings.新建空蓝图描述: Create a new Blueprint. (You can copy the code of another Blueprint and paste it on a new Blueprint to copy all planning on the original Blueprint to the new one.)
strings.新建蓝图集描述: Create a Blueprint portfolio. You can classify the Blueprints by putting the same type of Blueprints into a portfolio. (Modify the path of an existing Blueprint to move it)
strings.返回上一级描述: Click to go back to the previous directory.
strings.蓝图存放路径描述: Path for saving Blueprints. For example, if you enter "<color="#FD965ECC">Blueprint name</color>", it will save the Blueprint file as "<color="#FD965ECC">Blueprint name.txt</color>". If you enter "<color="#FD965ECC">Blueprint portfolio/Blueprint name</color>", it will automatically create a folder named "<color="#FD965ECC">Blueprint portfolio</color>", and save the Blueprint file as "<color="#FD965ECC">Blueprint name.txt</color>" to this folder.
strings.蓝图集存放路径描述: Path for saving Blueprint portfolios. For example, if you enter "<color="#FD965ECC">Blueprint portfolio</color>", it will save as a folder named "<color="#FD965ECC">Blueprint portfolio</color>". If you enter "<color="#FD965ECC">Category/Blueprint portfolio</color>", it will automatically create a folder named "<color="#FD965ECC">Category</color>", and save a folder named "<color="#FD965ECC">Blueprint portfolio</color>" to this folder.
strings.缩略图文字描述: The name of this Blueprint displayed in Blueprint Library.
strings.蓝图介绍描述: You can add a description of this Blueprint to describe its usage, planning and features.
strings.蓝图集介绍描述: You can add a description of this Blueprint portfolio to describe its usage, planning and features.
strings.剔除设施描述: Right-click to remove facilities that you don't want to include in the Blueprint. When you right-click the facility icon below, all such facilities will be removed from the Blueprint, and you can save your changes.
strings.复制蓝图代码描述: The Blueprint code is a unique ID for each Blueprint. Click this button to copy the Blueprint code below to the system clipboard. With this feature, you can copy your Blueprint code and paste it <color="#FD965ECC">in different saved games</color>, or you can <color="#FD965ECC">share</color> your Blueprints with others.
strings.粘贴蓝图代码描述: Paste the copied Blueprint code to this Blueprint. All planning of the original Blueprint will apply to this Blueprint. Save to apply your changes.
strings.删除蓝图描述: You can remove the selected Blueprint file from your hard drive. This can't be undone.
strings.保存更改描述: Apply all the above changes to the Blueprint file. If the path for saving is modified, the Blueprint file will be moved to the new path.
strings.删除蓝图集描述: Delete the selected Blueprint portfolio folder from your hard drive. This can't be undone.
strings.删除蓝图集提示:
The Blueprints inside will also be deleted. Continue to delete Blueprint portfolio [{0}]?
(This can't be undone)
strings.保存更改集描述: Apply all the above changes to the Blueprint portfolio. If the path for saving is modified, the Blueprint portfolio will be moved to the new path.
strings.重置蓝图描述: Clear and reset the Blueprint you're editing.
strings.立即使用描述: Copy the planning selected, and enable the <color="#FD965ECC">Paste Mode</color>. Note: This will not automatically save the Blueprint. Please save it first.
strings.保存蓝图描述: Save the selected planning as a Blueprint file to the Blueprint Library. (Don't forget to specify <color="#FD965ECC">Blueprint path</color>)
strings.单点选择提示文字:
Click on a single facility to select.
Press and hold [<color="#FD965ECC">SHIFT</color>] to select multiple objects.
strings.范围选择提示文字:
Select facilities within an area.
Press and hold [<color="#FD965ECC">SHIFT</color>] to select multiple objects.
strings.连锁选择提示文字: Expand selection to all adjacent facilities.
strings.拆除储物仓文字: There are too many items in the Depot to be placed in Inventory. Dismantling it will cause extra items to fall to the ground. Still dismantle it?
strings.拆除储液罐文字: There is too much fluid in the Storage Tank. Dismantling it will cause extra items to fall to the ground. Still dismantle it?
strings.拆除溢出设置提示: (A pop-up reminder box before dismantling Depot/Storage Tank/Logistics Station which contains too many items to be placed in the Inventory)
strings.拆除战场分析基站文字: Too many items in Battlefield Analysis Base to move to Inventory. Dismantling it causes extra items to fall to the ground. Dismantle it?
strings.撕毁停战协议文字: Once truce agreement is torn, Dark Fog will resume attack, and used Metadata will not be returned. Are you sure you want to proceed?
strings.戴森球面板提示: Open the Dyson Sphere panel, and design a plan.
strings.黑雾巢穴截取: Power intercepted by Dark Fog Hives
strings.复制戴森球蓝图代码描述: This Blueprint contains information of all Dyson Swarm orbits and Dyson Sphere layers in this Dyson Sphere. Click this button to copy the Blueprint code to the system clipboard. With this feature, you can copy your Blueprint code and paste it <color="#FD965ECC">in different saved games</color>, or you can <color="#FD965ECC">share</color> your Blueprints with others.
strings.粘贴戴森球蓝图代码描述: Paste the copied Blueprint code to this Dyson Sphere. All planning in the original Blueprint will apply to this Dyson Sphere immediately.
strings.复制戴森云蓝图代码描述: This Blueprint contains information of all Dyson Swarm orbits. Click this button to copy the Blueprint code to the system clipboard. With this feature, you can copy your Blueprint code and paste it <color="#FD965ECC">in different saved games</color>, or you can <color="#FD965ECC">share</color> your Blueprints with others.
strings.粘贴戴森云蓝图代码描述: Paste the copied Blueprint code to the Dyson Swarm orbit. All planning in the original Blueprint will apply to the Dyson Swarm orbit immediately.
strings.复制戴森壳蓝图代码描述: This Blueprint contains information of <color="#FD965ECC">all layers</color> of the Dyson Sphere. Click this button to copy the Blueprint code to the system clipboard. With this feature, you can copy your Blueprint code and paste it <color="#FD965ECC">in different saved games</color>, or you can <color="#FD965ECC">share</color> your Blueprints with others.
strings.复制戴森层级蓝图代码描述: This Blueprint contains information of only the <color="#FD965ECC">selected layers</color> of the Dyson Sphere. Click this button to copy the Blueprint code to the system clipboard. With this feature, you can copy your Blueprint code and paste it <color="#FD965ECC">in different saved games</color>, or you can <color="#FD965ECC">share</color> your Blueprints with others.
strings.粘贴戴森层级蓝图代码描述: Paste the copied Blueprint code to this layer. All planning in the original Blueprint will apply to this layer immediately.
strings.戴森云轨道编辑描述: Modify the parameters of this Dyson Swarm orbit.
strings.测地线框架描述:
Lay Frames along the shortest path between two points on the spherical surface.
Click this button to choose a Frame model for your building plan.
strings.经纬线框架描述:
Lay Frames along the graticule grid on the spherical surface. The curvature will be greater at high latitudes. If it is a diagonal line, it will change with the longitude and latitude.
Click this button to choose a Frame model for your building plan.
strings.修建节点描述: Plan and build the Dyson Sphere Node. Click this button to choose a Node model.
strings.修建壳面描述:
To ensure a Shell can be laid, the Nodes and Frames must form a closed polygon.
Click this button to choose a Shell model for your building plan.
strings.节点样式描述: Click to choose a Node model.
strings.框架样式描述: Click to choose a Frame model.
strings.壳面样式描述: Click to choose a Shell model.
strings.超出应力系统: Latitude too high (please upgrade stress system)
strings.壳中有节点: No Node allowed in a Shell
strings.戴森球自定义颜色描述: Click to modify the color of selected structure(s).
strings.橡皮擦描述: Click or press <color="#FD965ECC">E</color> to enter erase mode.
strings.太阳帆颜色描述: Customize the color of all Solar Sails in this orbit. Right click to reset to the default color.
strings.戴森球吸色工具描述: Extract color from Nodes, Frames, Shells or Grids.
strings.显示网格画布描述: Show the content on the Grid canvas.
strings.全选戴森节点提示: Click to select all Nodes in this layer.
strings.全选戴森框架提示: Click to select all Frames in this layer.
strings.全选戴森壳面提示: Click to select all Shells in this layer.
strings.隐藏火箭主体提示: This will stop rendering rocket models, and show only the flame effects.
strings.清除轨道上太阳帆: Remove Solar Sails in this orbit
strings.清除轨道上太阳帆提示: Remove Solar Sails in this orbit
strings.清除轨道上太阳帆描述:
Click to remove all Solar Sails in this orbit, including in-transit and transferred Solar Sails to this orbit.
(<color="#FD965EBB">Can't be undone!!</color>)
strings.清除自由轨道太阳帆描述:
Click to remove all free Solar Sails (meaning residual Solar Sails after a Dyson Sphere is demolished, or manually launched Solar Sails in Sandbox Mode)
(<color="#FD965EBB">Can't be undone!!</color>)
strings.清除全部太阳帆描述:
Click to remove all Solar Sails on this Dyson Sphere.
(<color="#FD965EBB">Can't be undone!!</color>)
strings.整理太阳帆内存描述:
(Experimental feature. No Solar Sails will be actually removed.)
A vacant space will be available in your PC memory when the service life of a Solar Sail ends. This feature allows new Solar Sails ejected to directly fill vacant spaces. If you've stopped batch-ejecting Solar Sails to this Dyson Sphere, you can click this button to optimize your memory.
strings.太阳帆无限寿命描述:
Click to grant Solar Sails on this Dyson Sphere an eternal service life
(Once done, it can't be undone until you remove all Solar Sails)
strings.戴森球自动建造提示描述: Click to enable Auto Fast Build. This will automatically build the Dyson Swarm or Dyson Sphere that you have planned for, and you don't have to eject any Solar Sail or launch any Small Carrier Rocket.
strings.戴森球数据不正确蓝图描述: Abnormal Dyson Sphere data detected. Blueprint will not be generated.
strings.戴森球蓝图复制成功描述: Copied! This Blueprint contains information of all Dyson Swarm orbits and Dyson Shell layers in this Dyson Sphere.
strings.戴森球蓝图非空描述: Please ensure that the current {0} does not contain any structure before applying Blueprint.
strings.戴森球蓝图网格画布覆盖描述: Applying Blueprint will <color="#FD965ECC">override</color> all content on the grid canvas of the current {0}. Continue?
strings.使用戴森球蓝图确认标题: Are you sure to apply the Blueprint Code?
strings.粘贴戴森壳蓝图代码描述: Paste the copied Blueprint code to all layers. All planning in the original Blueprint will apply to all layers immediately.
strings.戴森球蓝图纬度过高描述: Current stress system level is lower than the level required by the Blueprint. Please upgrade the stress system.
strings.戴森球蓝图错误描述: This is not a valid Blueprint Code.
strings.拆除层级描述: Dismantle all structures on the selected layer(s)?
strings.戴森云蓝图复制成功描述: Copied! This Blueprint contains information of all Dyson Swarm orbits.
strings.戴森壳蓝图复制成功描述: Copied! This Blueprint contains information of <color="#FD965ECC">all layers</color>.
strings.戴森层级蓝图复制成功描述: Copied! This Blueprint contains information of only the <color="#FD965ECC">current layer</color>.

strings.地轴倾角描述: The planet’s obliquity refers to the angle between a perpendicular to its orbital plane and its spin axis. It is the primary cause of the planet's seasonal cycle and affects solar reception efficiency everywhere, as well as the orbit ejection angle.

strings.异常反馈说明:
< This is not an error message>

You can still play the game if there is a data error, but you will be unable to receive Achievements or upload your data to the Milky Way. 
You can also load the game saved before the error occurred to fix this issue. 
Please contact the development team if you still have questions.
strings.帧率平衡设置提示文字:
Slide the <color=#7EFC5DB4>green</color> and <color=#61D8FFB6>blue</color> sliders to adjust the target ratio of the <color=#7EFC5DB4>render frame rate</color> to the <color=#61D8FFB6>logic frame rate</color> to balance the importance between <color=#7EFC5DB4>video smoothness</color> and the <color=#61D8FFB6>simulation speed</color>.

This setting activates only when there is a performance bottleneck that results in a frame rate drop. The optimal ratio varies among individuals due to differences in environmental conditions and demand. This setting cannot optimize the game's performance, as it varies depending on the specific application scenario. For example, the ratio can be set to 1:5 when you are away to ensure the game's simulation speed.

Elaboration:

The frame rate displayed in <color=#7EFC5DB4>green digits</color> is the render frame rate, which indicates the refresh rate of the graphics and usually depends on GPU performance.
The frame rate displayed in <color=#61D8FFB6>blue digits</color> is the logic frame rate, which indicates the computing rate of the game simulation and usually depends on CPU performance.
The target logic frame rate of the game is always <color=#61D8FFB6>60ups</color> to ensure that one second in the game world is equivalent to one second in the real world.
When the ratio is set to 1:3 and the render frame rate falls below <color=#7EFC5DB4>20fps</color>, the game's simulation speed will decrease.
Similarly, when the ratio is set to 1:2 and the render frame rate falls below <color=#7EFC5DB4>30fps</color>, the game's simulation speed will also decrease.
If the game's simulation speed falls below <color=#61D8FFB6>60ups</color>, the render frame rate will be reduced to <color=#7EFC5DB4>30fps</color> to maintain a logic frame rate that is as close as possible to the <color=#61D8FFB6>60ups</color> target.
When the ratio is set to 1:1, the logic frame rate can be slightly reduced to ensure video smoothness. 
When the ratio is set to 1:3, the render frame rate can be decreased further to <color=#7EFC5DB4>20fps</color> in order to maintain a logic frame rate that is as close as possible to the <color=#61D8FFB6>60ups</color> target.
